sec.p:
To maximize the opportunity for detecting changes in fat storage, we fat scored the birds on day 8 (20 °C) and day 22 (6 °C) which reduced handling and potential stress to the birds. The data are presented in Fig. A3.
Figure A1
The mean ± SE mass of the birds taken as the temperature was reduced from 20 °C to 6 °C.
Figure A2
The mean ± SE daily dietary intake of birds on experimental days 1–22. Vertical lines denote a change in temperature.
Figure A3
The mean ± SE fat score of the birds at 20 °C (day 8) and 6 °C (day 22).
